title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when selecting the data set.
OB: When selecting a data set in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases set for those columns.
EB: The expression builder should display the aliases set for the columns in the data set.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Set aliases for columns in a data set. 
2. Open the expression builder. 
3. Select the data set in the expression builder. 
4. Observe that the old column names are shown instead of the aliases.
